nodes.text: The Cargo Empress super freighter was a model of freighter produced by Ghtroc Industries. It was a commercial failure and led to the respected company going defunct by the Imperial Era.

In Star Wars canon, the Cargo Empress super freighter was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The vehicle originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Droids Defiant, a 1996 article written by Thomas Bowling and published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 9.
